ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Re: Prepare for another nerf...
ygData.msgSnippet: It is nice to see it s got buy in from those that like to watch movies while playing the mana song though. ... -- Artificial Intelligence stands no chance
ygData.messageBody:
It is nice to see it's got buy in from those that like to watch movies
while playing the mana song though.
